game.name: Cyborg War
game.description:
Do you want to wear the tag of being the most courageous man on this planet? Is it your dream to play the role of a soldier and clean your area from all the dangerous enemies? Join Cyborg War game and get ready to go on the toughest war mission of your life! You are going to play the role of a robot in this brand new adventure game. Do not bother friends! You are not alone, but your favorite machine gun will always be there to protect you against the enemies. 

There are multiple skills like cold ice, lightening and firestorm to use to allow you to stand strong against the horde of deadly enemies. You can also employ these magical skills to avoid traps and reach to the finish line. This is a beautifully-designed violent running game where you will meet a robot who has been trapped in an extremely dangerous place. The only way to escape from this area is to destroy all the robots attack in the air and help your character to land safely.

Do not forget to use your laser gun and bring all the special skills into use in this html5 platform game. Grab all the needful items, stars and improvements and prove the world that you are the coolest and best brave cyborg! Kill all your enemies and try to survive until you finish the mission! We know that you are sufficient enough to go through this dangerous place alone. Play online on atmegame.com more engaging and exciting adventure games for boys!
